label: This is not my document
description: User indicates the document does not belong to them.

label: I already replaced this document
description: The matched document has been replaced and is no longer valid (probably an old document).

label: User claimed
description: Applied automaticaaly to a match when asociated claim is created.

label: User cancelled claim
description: Applied automatically to a match when asociated claim is canclled by user

label: Claim Rejected
description: Applied automatically to a match when asociated claim is rejected by admin

label: Claim Verified
description: Applied automatically to a match when asociated claim is verified by admin

label: Invalid document
description: Submitted document is invalid or unacceptable.

label: Incomplete documentation
description: Required supporting documents were missing.

label: Incorrect information
description: Submitted information does not match official records.

label: Not eligible
description: Claimant does not meet eligibility requirements.

label: Policy violation
description: Claim violates defined policy or operational guidelines.

label: Policy violation
description: Claim violates defined policy or operational guidelines.

label: Policy violation
description: Claim violates defined policy or operational guidelines.

label: Fraud suspected
description: Suspicion of fraudulent activity during review.

description: Suspicion of fraudulent activity during review.

label: Fraud suspected
description: Suspicion of fraudulent activity during review.

label: Fraud confirmed
description: Fraud was confirmed after investigation.

label: Fraud confirmed
description: Fraud was confirmed after investigation.

label: Fraud confirmed
description: Fraud was confirmed after investigation.

label: New evidence invalidates claim
description: New evidence invalidates a previously verified claim.

label: Documents validated
description: Claim documents and information were reviewed and confirmed valid.

label: Dispute resolved in favor
description: A previously rejected claim was reinstated after dispute review.

label: Invalid submission
description: Claimant submitted claim with invalid attachment or information.

label: Claimant withdrew dispute
description: Claimant submitted claim with invalid attachment or information.

label: Claimant disputed claim rejection
description: Claimant formally challenged a rejection decision.

label: Dispute review completed
description: Dispute review process was completed.

label: Dispute review completed
description: Dispute review process was completed.

label: Other
description: Other reason not list in the reasons
